mapper.insert: insert into users(user_id, user_password, user_name, email, join_date, salt, profile) values(#{userId}, #{userPassword}, #{userName}, #{email}, now(), #{salt}, #{profile})
mapper.select: SELECT salt FROM users WHERE user_id= #{userId};
select user_id, user_name, email, join_date, profile from users where user_id like CONCAT('%', #{userId}, '%')
mapper.update: update users set profile = #{profile} where user_id = #{userId}
